Control Name: Identifies Information Requirements—A process is in place to identify the information required and expected to support the functioning of the other components of internal control and the achievement of the entity’s objectives.

control_attributes.Control: Identifies Information Requirements—A process is in place to identify the information required and expected to support the functioning of the other components of internal control and the achievement of the entity’s objectives.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC2.1 COSO Principle 13: The entity obtains or generates and uses relevant, quality information to support the functioning of internal control.
